about_the_game:
Don't like to fight fair? Neither do we!

Show off how rich you are by paying for this special hotkey to give yourself a periodic money boost and declare yourself the game winner! You'll be immortalized in a game-wide broadcast to everyone else while sowing jealously and claims of cheating that you'll casually ignore on your way to the top. Lame HTML-style graphic fireworks included!
detailed_description:
Don't like to fight fair? Neither do we!

Show off how rich you are by paying for this special hotkey to give yourself a periodic money boost and declare yourself the game winner! You'll be immortalized in a game-wide broadcast to everyone else while sowing jealously and claims of cheating that you'll casually ignore on your way to the top. Lame HTML-style graphic fireworks included!
name: Cash Grab - Pay To Win

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compliant Video chipset
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Sound Compliant Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Better
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz Dual Core Processor or Higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compliant Video chipset
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Sound Compliant Device

short_description: Show off how rich you are by paying for this special hotkey to give yourself a periodic money boost and declare yourself the game winner!
